# min(_:_:)

**Function**

Vector-scalar minimum.  Each component of the result is the minimum of the corresponding element of the input vector and the scalar.

## Declaration

```swift
func min(_ vector: simd_half2, _ scalar: Float16) -> simd_half2
```
